name: .RDLC File Extension
type_name: Visual Studio Client Report Definition File
summary: Learn about .RDLC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Report definition file created by Microsoft Visual Studio, an application that allows developers to create Windows programs; contains layout settings, text fields, graphics, and other information for the report; stored using XML formatting.

content: RDLC files are used for generating reports within a client application running Visual Studio's ReportViewer control in local processing mode (in contrast to remote processing mode).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
